comment._content: Think this is him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Alfred_Thomas,_1st_Viscount_R... Elsewhere in this week's batch: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8147806387/]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: He and his daughter were aboard the Lusitania when it was torpedoed. www.rmslusitania.info/people/saloon/david-alfred-thomas/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The Day book., July 15, 1915, NOON EDITION, Image 10 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83045487/1915-07-15/ed-... reports that he had arrived in the US recently, to acquire munitions. NYT of July 6, 1915 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F3061EFB3B5C13738... reports that he arrived from Liverpool on the St. Louis

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Good sleuthing swanq, and thanks pennylrichardsca for linking the two photographs. We'll add some of the information you've provided to both records the next time we update.
